channel.title: 🏢 Computer Science Department, RWTH Aachen University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Computer Science Department, RWTH Aachen University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Probabilistic Graph Rewiring via Virtual Nodes
item.description: IPR-MPNNs revolutionize graph neural networks by implicitly rewiring graphs using virtual nodes, achieving state-of-the-art performance with significantly faster computation.
